blogs.title: Complete Guide to Spice Export
blogs.excerpt: Learn strategies and tips for successfully exporting Indonesian spices to the global market

blogs.title: Ministry Releases Cardamom Export Worth Hundreds of Millions to China
blogs.excerpt: Bambang added that the Directorate General of Horticulture will maximize the Medicinal Plant Village program to increase cardamom productivity and added value, so it can meet the quality and quantity standards of exporting companies.

blogs.title: Ministry Releases White Cardamom Export Worth Rp 1.5 Billion to China
blogs.excerpt: Bambang added that the Directorate General of Horticulture will maximize the Medicinal Plant Village program to increase cardamom productivity and added value, so it can meet the quality and quantity standards of exporting companies.

blogs.title: 25 Tons of Indonesian White Cardamom Enters Chinese Market
blogs.excerpt: Cardamom has high demand from many countries, one of which is the Netherlands. However, there are still not many cardamom exporters. Therefore, I really appreciate CV Suwarna Indosemesta which exports at least 20 containers of white cardamom or about 250 tons per month.

blogs.title: Indonesian Cinnamon Exports Increase 25% in European Market
blogs.excerpt: The Director General of Foreign Trade stated that Indonesian cinnamon exports to the European market experienced a significant increase of 25% compared to the previous year, showing that Indonesian product quality is increasingly recognized by the international community.

blogs.title: Indonesia Exports 500 Tons of Cloves to India and Pakistan
blogs.excerpt: The Minister of Trade appreciates the achievement of Indonesian clove exports that successfully penetrated the Indian and Pakistani markets with a total volume of 500 tons, proving the superior quality of Indonesian spices in the global market.

blogs.title: Indonesian Vanilla Exports Reach Highest Record in American Market
blogs.excerpt: Indonesian vanilla exports to the United States market reached the highest record with a value reaching 2 billion US dollars, showing that Indonesian vanilla quality is highly valued in international markets.

blogs.title: Indonesia Exports 1000 Tons of Ginger to Japan and Korea
blogs.excerpt: The achievement of Indonesian ginger exports to Japan and South Korea reached 1000 tons, proving that Indonesian ginger quality meets international standards and is in demand in East Asian markets.

blogs.title: Indonesian Turmeric Exports Increase 40% in European Market
blogs.excerpt: Indonesian turmeric exports to the European market experienced a significant increase of 40% compared to the previous year, showing high demand for Indonesian spices in the European continent.

blogs.title: Indonesia Exports 750 Tons of Black Pepper to United States
blogs.excerpt: Indonesian black pepper exports to the United States reached 750 tons, proving that Indonesian pepper quality is highly valued in the American market and becoming one of the leading export commodities.

blogs.title: Indonesian Spice Exports Reach 5 Billion US Dollar Target
blogs.excerpt: The achievement of Indonesian spice exports successfully reached the target of 5 billion US dollars in the first half of 2023, showing the significant contribution of the spice sector to the national economy.

blogs.title: Indonesia Exports 300 Tons of Candlenuts to Malaysia and Singapore
blogs.excerpt: Indonesian candlenut exports to Malaysia and Singapore reached 300 tons, proving that Indonesian candlenut quality meets international standards and is in demand in Southeast Asian markets.
